title: Home In West Bloomfield Available For Lease With Walled Lake Schools
posting_body: IF THIS PROPERTY DOESN'T FIT YOUR NEEDS, FEEL FREE TO CALL OR EMAIL ME
I MAY HAVE OTHER PROPERTIES TO PASS BY YOU
show contact info
3 Beds
1.5 Baths
2368 Square Ft
Let the sun shine in to this beautiful raised ranch home with 3 bedrooms and 1.5 baths with Lake Privileges available with optional Bayside Beach membership.
Spacious floor plan with large windows for lots of natural light.
Living room with cathedral ceilings and skylights.
Large updated kitchen with granite countertops and lots of cabinet space.
Large front porch, and deck in back yard.
Large, lower level with family room with wood burning fireplace, laundry room, recreation space and tons of storage.
Side turned attached garage with space for 2 cars and your boat!
Beautiful treed, shaded, and quiet street.
Get out in the water, on All Sports Upper Straits Lake and enjoy boating, water skiing, tubing, swimming, sandy beach, picnics, fireworks and more.
Bayside Beach Club offers members a park, beach, boat slips (subject to availability), and boat launch with day docks on private Upper Straits Lake.
Close to shopping, entertainment, parks, and restaurants.
Don’t delay, come see this home today!
Owner prefers long term lease.
Rent includes water and upkeep of extensive landscaping.
Tenant responsible for lawn maintenance and snow removal.

The agent does not guarantee the accuracy of the square footage, lot size, or other information concerning the conditions or features of the property provided by the seller or obtained from public records or other sources.
The buyer is advised to independently verify the accuracy of all information through personal inspection and with appropriate professionals.
Presented by: Christopher Berna
